blocks.TITLE: Introduction
blocks.SUBTITLE: Welcome to our Terms of Service
blocks.DESC: These terms govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with these terms.

blocks.TITLE: Eligibility
blocks.SUBTITLE: Who can use our services
blocks.DESC: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. By agreeing to these terms, you represent that you meet this age requirement.

blocks.TITLE: User Responsibilities
blocks.SUBTITLE: What we expect from users
blocks.DESC: Users are responsible for keeping their account information secure. You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account.

blocks.TITLE: Prohibited Activities
blocks.SUBTITLE: What you are not allowed to do
blocks.DESC: You agree not to engage in any activities that violate the law, infringe on the rights of others, or interfere with our services.

blocks.TITLE: Termination of Services
blocks.SUBTITLE: When we can terminate access
blocks.DESC: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our services if you violate any of these terms or engage in prohibited activities.

blocks.TITLE: Changes to Terms
blocks.SUBTITLE: When terms can be updated
blocks.DESC: We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated terms on our website.

blocks.TITLE: Governing Law
blocks.SUBTITLE: Which laws apply
blocks.DESC: These terms are governed by the laws of [Your Country]. Any disputes arising from these terms will be resolved in the courts of [Your Country].

blocks.TITLE: Contact Information
blocks.SUBTITLE: How to contact us
blocks.DESC: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at support@yourdomain.com.
